name: Escape the Lab
description:
„Escape the Lab“ is a short ~30-40 minutes Virtual Reality experience of an Escape Room that focuses on realistic chemical experiments and was created by a small three-man student team over the course of half a year.


Play as a person who is stuck inside a chemical laboratory during cold wintertime. Will you be able to find all the required clues and escape?


  • Discover and perform various experiments
  • Search for clues to progress further in the game
  • Interact with every object
  • Mix any liquids
  • Compete with other players in the leader boards
  • Collect achievements
  • Escape before the timer runs out
